recipe_name: Carrots with chive and chervil dressing
author: Richard Phillips
method: Blanch the carrots in boiling water for 4-5 minutes. Drain. Arrange the carrots on a serving plate and scatter over the strips of ham.  Whisk the mustard, vinegar, oil, herbs, salt and freshly ground black pepper together in a bowl to make the dressing. Pour the dressing over the carrots and ham and serve.
ingredients: 4 baby carrots, peeled but tops left on,  2 slices Serrano ham, cut into strips,  1 tsp Dijon mustard,  1 tbsp red wine vinegar,  3 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp chopped fresh chives,  1 tbsp chopped fresh chervil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
